blogPost.excerpt: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
blogPost.body: Blixi is a relaxing puzzle game with beautiful neumorphic design and innovative fresh gameplay. Compete for the top ranks with players from around the world on the constantly updated leaderboards. Blixi is an ideal casual game.
blogPost.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle
blogPost.author: Olivér Papp

localize.description: Blixi是一款轻松的益智游戏，拥有精美的neumorphic设计和创新的新鲜玩法。在不断更新的排行榜上，与来自世界各地的玩家一起争夺最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休闲游戏。
Blixi是一款輕鬆的益智遊戲，擁有精美的neumorphic設計和創新的新鮮玩法。在不斷更新的排行榜上，與來自世界各地的玩家一起爭奪最高排名。Blixi是一款理想的休閒遊戲。

previous.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
previous.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.

localize.description: 与你的团队激发友好竞争，提高士气，来自 Slack! 大家轮流抽签，猜测提示。你猜得越快，得到的分数就越多。非常适合在会议前、周四社交、或只是休息时使用。最多可容纳12人。
與你的團隊激發友好競爭，提高士氣，來自 Slack! 大家輪流抽籤，猜測提示。你猜得越快，得到的分數就越多。非常適合在會議前、週四社交、或只是休息時使用。最多可容納12人。
